timeline.bodyText: this method could be moved to org.infinispan.cli.impl.ContextAwareCommandInvocation. The User cli command uses a similar code to ask for the user's password.
timeline.author: pruivo

timeline.bodyText:
nitpick: the prompt should be different if the file exists.
Set a password for the credential store => if the file doesn't exist.
something like Credential store password => if the file exists.
timeline.author: pruivo

replies.bodyText: ps. use the second prompt for remove/ls commands.
replies.author: pruivo

Same comment for parseKeyStore(), parseTrustStoreRealm() and parseDataSourceConnectionFactory()

timeline.bodyText: would it be better to always fail is alias==null? To avoid any chance of returning the wrong credential.

replies.bodyText: You cannot return the wrong credential if there is only one :)

timeline.bodyText:
note: I'm probably overthinking here...
do you want the path?
if I set --path, the --server-root is ignored. If I set  --server-root only, I can't change the credentials file name.
